text:
Death and Other Details (2024)
--------------------------

### Basic Info

* Chinese name: 海上密室谋杀案
* English name: Death and Other Details
* Year: 2024
* Region: US
* Genre: Mystery, Crime, Suspense
* Rating: Not rated
* Languages: English
* Premiere: January 16, 2024 (US)
* IMDb rating: 6.6/10 (272 user ratings)
* Douban rating: 7.2/10 (1,144 user ratings)
* Episode count: 10
* Episode length: ~60 minutes
* Directors: Yangzom Brauen, David Petrarca, Marc Webb
* Writers: Heidi Cole McAdams, Mike Weiss, Louisa Levy
* Stars: Violett Beane, Mandy Patinkin, Linda Emond, Lauren Patten, Pardis Saremi, Angela Zhou, Hugo Diego Garcia, Christian Svensson, Karoline, Jere Burns, Annie Q., Sincere Wilbert, James Pizzinato, Edem Nyamadi, Sophia Reid-Gantzert, Adrianna Olson, Mauricio Romero, Sofia Rosinsky, Fraser Aitcheson, Jeff Gonek, Rahul Kohli

### Synopsis

In the world of the top 1%, Imogene finds herself accused of murder aboard a luxurious Mediterranean cruise ship. Determined to prove her innocence, she teams up with investigator Rufus to solve the case. However, all wealthy passengers and exhausted crew members become suspects in this enclosed floating city.
